feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: v. 7.0.13 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.0.13 is available. See the download page for details
entry.summary: The v. 7.0.13 is available. See the download page for details

entry.title: v. 7.0.10 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.0.10 is available. New features (add subjects to modifiers, ethogram sorting) and some bugs fixed
entry.summary: The v. 7.0.10 is available. New features (add subjects to modifiers, ethogram sorting) and some bugs fixed

entry.title: v. 6.3.9 is available
entry.content: The v. 6.3.9 is available. Bug fixed in export events as behavioral strings function
entry.summary: The v. 6.3.9 is available. Bug fixed in export events as behavioral strings function

entry.title: v. 7.0.9 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.0.9 is available. Various improvements were made. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history-v.-7 for details.
entry.summary: The v. 7.0.9 is available. Various improvements were made. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history-v.-7 for details.
